name: Chronicles of Tal’Dun: prologue stories
description:
Collection of stories following several characters who will appear in our next game Chronicles of Tal’Dun: The Hunger. These are a linear chronicles of the events that bring them together and will give you some background to their personal histories and the lore of our world.

For now there is the first short chapter of Evin. We are trying out new things with pronouns in our writing so if you get confused you can read about them in the glossary.

These stories will be released one chapter every month for free. For those who would like them sooner, they are available for our supporters of Magus tier and above on Kofi and Patreon. 

This is a work in progress so a lot of things will change over time. Also, let us know if you spot any typos or other issues. We are trying our best, but there are probably many things we missed.

Huge thanks to our test readers Brombeer,  Aetheries and Sarianne who read what we write many, many times and without them this would be just an angry swarm of typos.

Written in ink developed by inklestudios.
